VM

创建vm

apiVersion: kubevirt.io/v1
kind: VirtualMachine
metadata:
name: testvm
spec:
running: false
template:
    metadata:
    labels:
        kubevirt.io/size: small
        kubevirt.io/domain: testvm
    spec:
    domain:
        devices:
        disks:
            - name: containerdisk
            disk:
                bus: virtio
            - name: cloudinitdisk
            disk:
                bus: virtio
        interfaces:
        - name: default
            masquerade: {}
        resources:
        requests:
            memory: 64M
    networks:
    - name: default
        pod: {}
    volumes:
        - name: containerdisk
        containerDisk:
            image: quay.io/kubevirt/cirros-container-disk-demo
        - name: cloudinitdisk
        cloudInitNoCloud:
            userDataBase64: SGkuXG4=
    nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/arch: arm64
